name: Nidhogg 2
description: The rules are simple. Reach the other side and kill anyone that stands in your way. Deftly parry and rend their throats, riddle their bowels with arrows, or squish their brains between your toes. The wurm cares not for chivalry.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space Additional Notes: PS4 or Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core CPU or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space Additional Notes: PS4 or Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
